name: Tricky Tiles
description:
RULES

Land on as many green tiles as possible to improve your score. Dodge red tiles. Every time you play the level, more red or green tiles will turn into mystery yellow tiles - you must remember if they were green or red from the previous go. Once you have passed the final level, the game will reset with a different map. You can hold down super jump to jump two tiles.

CONTROLS

Left Stick / WASD - Move                 Shift / Right Trigger - Superjump
